title: Complete Reliance on Fossil Fuels
description: In 2022, Azerbaijan's energy consumption was entirely dependent on fossil fuels, making up 100% of the total energy usage.

title: Low Adequacy of Social Insurance Programs
description: As of 2015, only 24.26% of the total welfare of beneficiary households in Azerbaijan was covered by social insurance programs, indicating a significant gap in social safety nets.

title: Significant Support to Poorest Quintile through Social Insurance
description: In 2015, 15.92% of Azerbaijan's total social insurance benefits were directed towards the poorest quintile, showcasing a targeted approach to aid the most vulnerable.

title: Minimal Tobacco Use Among Female Adults
description: By 2022, only 0.1% of female adults in Azerbaijan were current tobacco users, reflecting one of the lowest prevalence rates globally.
